# PE Dashboard for Speak

## 1. Company Overview
**Legal Name:** Speakeasy Labs, Inc.
**Brand Name:** Speak
**Company ID:** speak
**Website:** https://www.speak.com/
**Industry:** Education, Language Learning, AI
**Founded:** 2020
**Headquarters:** San Francisco, California, United States

## 2. Business Model and GTM
**Products/Services:**
- **Speak Tutor**: The world’s best language teacher. Speak Tutor is your very own language tutor, dedicated to helping you improve 24/7.
  - Pricing: Subscription

**Target Market:** Education, Language Learning, AI

## 3. Funding & Investor Profile
**Total Raised:** $150,000,000 USD
**Last Valuation:** $1,000,000,000 USD
**Last Round:** Series C

**Funding Events:**

**Raising $78M Series C at a $1B valuation** (2024-12-10)
- Round: Series C
- Amount: $78,000,000 USD
- Valuation: $1,000,000,000 USD

**Speak Hits $500M Valuation** (2024-06-18)
- Valuation: $500,000,000 USD

**OpenAI Startup Fund-Backed Speak Announces $16m Series B-2 Financing** (2023-08-31)
- Round: Series B-2
- Amount: $16,000,000 USD

## 4. Growth Momentum
**Headcount:** 130 employees

## 5. Visibility & Market Sentiment

## 6. Risks and Challenges
No significant risks identified

## 7. Outlook
Not disclosed
